About A&A Associate

A&A Associate LLC is a trusted and reputable company that specializes in providing comprehensive business solutions. With a strong commitment to accuracy and excellence, we have established ourselves as a leader in the industry.

Our team of highly skilled professional business setup consultants in Dubai has extensive experience in various domains, including finance, accounting, business consulting, and tax services. We strive to understand the unique needs of each client and offer customized solutions to help them achieve their goals.

At A&A Associate LLC, we believe in building long-term relationships with our clients, based on trust and integrity. We work closely with them to understand their specific requirements and provide personalized solutions to meet their business needs.
We stay abreast of the latest industry trends and regulations to ensure that our clients receive accurate and up-to-date information. Our goal is to provide reliable and timely support so that our clients can focus on what they do best – running their business.
Choose A&A Associate LLC for all your business needs and experience the difference that our expertise can make.

Why? Where? Who?

Who A&A Associate LLC?

A&A Associate LLC is a leading financial consulting firm with years of experience and expertise in providing comprehensive and customized solutions to help organizations achieve their financial goals. With a dedicated team of company formation consultants in Dubai, we specialize in accounting, auditing, tax planning, and business advisory services. Our commitment to excellence, integrity, and client satisfaction sets us apart in the industry. We understand the unique challenges that businesses face, and we pride ourselves on being a trusted partner to guide you towards success.

Why A&A Associate LLC?

At A&A Associate LLC, we believe that success is built on a strong financial foundation. We bring our in-depth knowledge, industry insights, and creative problem-solving skills to every engagement, ensuring we find the best solutions for our clients. Our team of highly qualified and the best business setup consultants in Dubai is passionate about helping businesses navigate complex financial landscapes and make informed decisions. With our comprehensive suite of services, we offer customized solutions that meet the specific needs and goals of each client. Partnering with us means gaining a trusted advisor who is committed to your success.

Where is A&A Associate LLC?

With offices strategically located in major cities, A&A Associate LLC serves clients across the country. We are accessible to businesses of all sizes and industries, ranging from startups to established corporations. Our presence in key locations allows us to understand regional markets, regulations, and trends, enabling us to offer insightful advice customized to your specific location. Whether you are based in a bustling metropolis or a smaller town, our company setup consultants in Dubai are readily available to provide the support and expertise you need. With A&A Associate LLC, you can be confident that you have a reliable partner by your side, no matter where your business is located.

Set up Business.Step up Success.

Faq

Frequently Asked Questions on Business Setup

What type of UAE companies can I start?

UAE allows company formation in free zone, mainland, or offshore. Business setup in UAE mainland requires a local sponsor and the license is issued by DED. Free zone companies can operate within a limited geographical region and the license is issued by particular free zone authority. 

 

Offshore businesses in UAE allow your company to trade outside UAE as well as take efforts to safeguard your wealth and assets. Offshore companies get a certificate of incorporation and not a trade license. All types of companies can be started in UAE and more than a thousand activities are allowed by the Economic Department.

How to renew my business license in the mainland?

If you want to renew your Dubai commercial license, the applicant should submit the DED registered certificate with the necessary approval from the Ministry of Economy and National Media Company. If you want to renew your Dubai trade license, then you should submit a valid Ejari certificate and other lease contracts.

A&A Associate supports entrepreneurs in obtaining their business license in Dubai and timely renewal of the same.

Why should I start my company in UAE?

UAE is a perfectly located biggest market of the world. It serves as a perfect destination to invest in different kinds of business. The business owners are free from taxes and they can expect exceptional logistics in all the emirates. You don’t have any capital restrictions while starting your business. Financial freedom is an attractive point that brings in employees from foreign districts.

UAE has mind-blowing business opportunities; business setup Consultant in UAE can guide you through the entire company formation process!

How long will it take to setup a free zone company?

Being a trustworthy and professional business consultant, we ensure fast and reliable business setup in UAE free zones. Usually, it takes around 3 to 10 days to setup your free zone company; it may differ according to the selected free zone. We make sure that all your documents are legal and concerned authorities have attested them.

If you’re not consulting a business consultant, it will take up to few weeks and it’s becomes difficult to clear all the legal procedures. So, consider A&A for your free zone business setup!

How to start an LLC company in UAE?

To establish your LLC Company in Dubai mainland or anywhere else in UAE, you have to reserve a trade name and other necessary preliminary approvals from concerned authorities. You get an MOA from the company and also, submit the lease contract to the licensing authority. Also, find a local partner and rented office space to start your business.

A&A Associate offer few inclusive and affordable packages according to your business setup requirements.

What kind of company structure should I choose?

This depends on your needs, as well as the needs of your business. You could set up your company as a Sole Establishment (this is the same as a Sole Proprietorship), as a Limited Liability Partnership, a Limited Liability Company, a Private Limited Company, or a Professional Services Company.

You also have the option of setting up your company on the mainland, in a free zone (only limited liability company structures are permitted here), or offshore.

Do I need to rent an office for my business?

A physical presence is mandatory for companies established on the mainland and in free zones. However, an offshore company is not permitted to lease office space in the UAE.

The good news is that there is affordable office space for everyone. If you want to keep your initial costs down, you could look at renting an office or any number of dedicated desks in a co-working space on the mainland. These are all fully furnished and ready to move in. In a free zone, you need to rent at least a desk in a shared office space. The added advantage is the some free zones allow you rent a flexi-desk, that is a desk you will be using for say, ten hours in a week. You still get your dedicated PO Box so that you have a unique address.

How to identify the best business setup consultants in Dubai?

To identify the best business setup consultants in Dubai, look for the following parameters:

  • Expertise: Professionals and industry experts can customize your experience according to your requirements.
  • Local Knowledge: Consultants who have worked with the local rules and regulations and made businesses thrive are the best to go after for your needs.
  • Quick & Effective: Fast setup with effective and comprehensive solutions make the process hassle-free.

A&A Associate is a superbrand known for the three parameters.

A&A Associate LLC's Seamless Business Setup Solutions

Setting up a business with A&A Associate LLC is a hassle-free and efficient process. Our team of experienced business consultancy services in Dubai has extensive knowledge of the local business environment and regulatory requirements.

Clients can expect personalized attention and support throughout the entire business setup process. A&A Associate LLC , The company setup consultants in Dubai values client satisfaction and ensures that all legal obligations are met, allowing entrepreneurs to focus on their core business activities

1. Process of Business Setup
Setting up a business can be a complex and time-consuming task, especially in a foreign country like Dubai. A&A Associate LLC provides comprehensive business setup services to simplify the process for entrepreneurs and investors.
The first step in the process is to determine the legal structure of the business. A&A Associate LLC offers guidance and assistance in selecting the most suitable legal structure, whether it is a mainland company, free zone entity, or offshore company. They carefully assess the client’s needs and objectives to ensure the chosen structure aligns with their business goals.
Once the legal structure is determined, A&A Associate LLC assists in the preparation and submission of all the necessary documentation required for company registration. This includes drafting of articles of association, obtaining necessary licenses and permits, and completing registration with relevant authorities.
2. Company Formation Locations
Dubai offers a variety of options for company formation, including mainland and free zone jurisdictions. A&A Associate LLC has in-depth knowledge of the different locations and can provide expert advice on the best location based on the nature of the business and the client’s requirements.
For entrepreneurs looking to cater to the local market and have unrestricted access to the UAE market, setting up a business in mainland Dubai is a popular choice. A&A Associate LLC guides clients through the process of obtaining necessary approvals from Dubai Department of Economic Development (DED) and other authorities.
Free zones are another option for company formation in Dubai. These designated areas offer a range of benefits such as 100% foreign ownership and exemption from taxes and customs duties. A&A Associate LLC assists clients in choosing the most appropriate free zone based on their business activities and requirements.
3. Cost of Business Setup in Dubai

The cost of setting up a business in Dubai can vary depending on several factors such as the type of legal structure, company formation location, and the specific services required. A&A Associate LLC offers transparent and competitive pricing for their business setup services.

The cost of setting up a mainland company in Dubai involves various expenses, including license fees, registration fees, and office space rental. Free zone company setup costs may include license fees, visa fees, and leasing a work space within the designated free zone.
During the initial consultation, A&A Associate LLC provides clients with a detailed breakdown of the costs involved in setting up a business in Dubai, allowing entrepreneurs to make informed decisions.
4. Other Business Setup Services in Dubai
In addition to company formation, A&A Associate LLC offers a range of other business setup services to support entrepreneurs in Dubai. These services include assistance with bank account opening, corporate sponsorship, visa processing, and accounting and bookkeeping.
Opening a bank account is a crucial part of running a business, and A&A Associate LLC can guide clients through the process of choosing the right bank and provide support in fulfilling all the necessary requirements.
Corporate sponsorship is required for certain business activities in Dubai, and A&A Associate LLC can connect clients with trusted local sponsors who meet the legal requirements and can support their business endeavors.

Visa processing is an integral part of business setup, and our company formation consultants in Dubai can assist clients in obtaining various types of visas for their employees and partners.

5. Setup Business with A&A Associate LLC
Setting up a business with A&A Associate LLC is a hassle-free and efficient process. Our team of experienced business consultancy services in Dubai has extensive knowledge of the local business environment and regulatory requirements.
Clients can expect personalized attention and support throughout the entire business setup process. A&A Associate LLC values client satisfaction and ensures that all legal obligations are met, allowing entrepreneurs to focus on their core business activities.
